favoriteSeries.name: Warhammer
favoriteSeries.description: My favorite series is warhammer, it has a mixture of book, a tabletop game, videgames and they are going to produce a tv series with Henry Cavil as protagonist.

lastBook.name: Shadow Slave
lastBook.information: The last book I read was Shadow Slave, a written in english webnovel.
lastBook.opinion: I find it easy to read and I like the story and the main character.

englishLevel.description: I can easily undertand videos or book in english but speaking is not samething I’m used to.

computerScience.description: I have gone to the first year of university where I learn a lot about programing but nothing about html, css or javascript.
